condition:
[AND]([EQ](<*VALUE(Experion Software Release)*>,R530))
[OR]([EQ](<*VALUE(DMS Flex Station Hardware Selection)*>,STN_STD_DELL_Tower_NonRAID),[EQ](<*VALUE(DMS Console Station Hardware Selection)*>,STN_STD_DELL_Tower_NonRAID),[EQ](<*VALUE(DMS Console Station Extension Hardware Selection)*>,STN_STD_DELL_Tower_NonRAID))
name: DMS Remote Peripheral Hide
action: <*DISALLOWVALUES(DMS Remote Peripheral Solution Type RPS:Extio3_Multi_Mode_Fiber,DMS Remote Peripheral Solution Type RPS:Extio3_Single_Mode_Fiber)*>
